Initiate a data fetch operation

Verify a loading spinner animation starts immediately, has 'spin' animation with duration 1s linear infinite, width 32px, color #007bff, and is centered horizontally at x 50% and vertically at y 50% of the container
Verify the loading spinner becomes hidden after 2 seconds
Open the date picker calendar
Verify the current date '2023-10-27' is highlighted with background color #007bff and font weight 700
Verify the date picker widget is visible, has width 300px and height 280px
Verify the day cells have 5px padding and border radius 3px
Verify the month navigation buttons are enabled
Scroll the page down by 500px

Verify the 'Back to Top' button becomes visible at scroll-top position greater than 400px, has opacity 1, is positioned fixed at bottom 20px, right 20px, has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, and width 120px
Examine a product card on the listing page
Verify the product name text 'Premium T-Shirt' has font size 16px, font family 'Roboto', and color #333333
Verify the product card's background color is #ffffff, has 1px solid #eeeeee border, 10px margin on all sides, overall width 200px, and height 300px
Click on the 'Reviews' tab
Verify the 'Reviews' tab becomes active with background color #e0e0e0 and bottom border 3px solid #007bff
Verify its text 'Reviews (150)' has font weight 700 and color #000000
Verify its padding is 12px 18px, and its aria-label is 'Product Reviews Tab'
Trigger a success message
Verify the 'Success!' alert box is visible, has green background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, border radius 4px, 15px padding, left position 50px, width 300px, and text align 'center'
Verify the 'Success!' alert box disappears with a transition of 500ms after 3 seconds
Select the 'Opt-in for newsletters' checkbox
Verify the checkbox's state changes to 'selected'
Verify its associated label 'Opt-in for newsletters' has color #333333 and font size 14px
Verify the checkbox itself has a square shape with 2px blue border #007bff when selected, and its x, y coordinates are 10, 20
Start a file upload

Verify the progress bar is visible, its width increases from 0% to 100% within 10 seconds, has background color #28a745, displays value text 75% with font size 12px and color #ffffff, and has height 10px and border radius 5px
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip becomes visible, displays text 'Click for assistance', has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, border radius 4px, positioned top 5px, left 10px relative to the icon, and opacity 0.9
Hover over the third row in the data table
Verify the third row's background color changes from #ffffff to #f8f9fa, and its text color remains #333333
Verify each cell within the row has 8px padding and font family 'Verdana'
Verify the row's height is 40px and its border bottom is 1px solid #dee2e6
Verify the first cell displays count '3'
Navigate to 'Home > Products > Category'
Verify the breadcrumb items are visible
Verify the active breadcrumb item 'Category' has font weight 700 and color #000000
Verify the inactive breadcrumb items have font weight 400 and color #6c757d
Verify each breadcrumb item has 5px margin right and 0px padding
Verify the breadcrumb separator is '>'
Load the homepage

Verify the main page heading 'Welcome to Our Store' is visible, has font size 36px, font family 'Montserrat', font weight 700, text color #333333, 20px margin bottom, is centered horizontally, width 800px, and aria-label 'Main page title'
Inspect the 'Quick Links' section in the footer
Verify the 'Quick Links' section has background color #f8f9fa, 30px padding, and is positioned at bottom 0px
Verify the 'Quick Links' section contains 4 links
Verify each quick link has font size 14px, color #6c757d, is aligned vertically, has 8px margin bottom, and is enabled
